ygData.subject: Mid-range hunting grounds...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello fellow clerics: I have a lvl 12 dwarven cleric on Tarrew Mar and am wondering where some good hunting grounds are for the mid-levels.  I ve been trying
ygData.messageBody:
Hello fellow clerics:

I have a lvl 12 dwarven cleric on Tarrew Mar and am wondering where some
good hunting grounds are for the mid-levels. I've been trying to hunt down
wisps, but I can't find a reasonable concentration of them. Is there a
place that's particularly good for wisp hunting? Any other tips for
advancing through these rather laborious levels? I've tried soloing (which
is about suicide) and grouping, but it's just slow. Lemme know what you
think and how you made it to lvl 14. Also, any money-making tips for this
strength would be MUCH appreciated =) We all know a cleric's life is one of
perpetual poverty.

Thanks,

Aran'gar
Right Hand of the Dark
Tarrew Mar
